name: Up We Go (SlurpADerp)
description:
You go up the mountain to get a flag while avoiding getting shot, stabbed, or bumping into spikes.

W - Jump

W/S - Climb up or down rope while swinging

A/D - Left/Right

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Hold to use Grapple hook on rocks

Wall jumping requires you to alternate between holding the directional key adjacent to the wall you are on while pressing jump. Unfortunately the game is very buggy and rushed but I plan on polishing it up after the game jam. I still have to fix a bug on restarting the game when the player dies along with some other ones like the spears not following the enemy spear men after stabbing the player.
